recipe.title: Jerusalem Artichokes with Salsa Verde
ingredients: 3 pounds Jerusalem artichokes (also called sunchokes), unpeeled, cut into 1 1/2" pieces
4 anchovy fillets packed in oil, drained, finely chopped
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F. Toss Jerusalem artichokes with 1/2 cup oil on a baking sheet; season with salt and pepper. Roast, tossing halfway through, until soft, 25–30 minutes. Mix anchovies, garlic, parsley, capers, vinegar, red pepper flakes, and remaining 1/2 cup oil in a small bowl; season with salt and pepper. Serve with Jerusalem artichokes.
